name: PENNSYLVANIA STATE LODGE, FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, a Pennsylvania nonprofit corporation, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, and DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Appellee

parties: PENNSYLVANIA STATE LODGE, FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, a Pennsylvania nonprofit corporation, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, and DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of the Commonwealth Court entered April 8, 1997 is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 1129
PENNSYLVANIA STATE LODGE, FRATERNAL ORDER OF POLICE, a Pennsylvania nonprofit corporation, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, and DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 25, 1998.
